description: Creates concise, structured summaries of document content

output_definition.name: summary
output_definition.description: A condensed version of the document that captures essential information

bullet_points.description: Key points in bulleted list format

narrative.description: Flowing narrative that preserves the document's story
narrative.focus: Sequence of events or discussion flow

chronological.description: Follows the timeline of the document

importance_indicators: Emphasis by speakers ('I want to emphasize', 'the main thing is')

agent_instructions.planner: Analyze the document to identify its structure, type, and main purpose. Determine if it's a meeting transcript, report, article, or other document type. Identify main topics, key participants, and the overall goal of the document. Create specific extraction instructions that focus on the most important content given the document type and selected summary format.
agent_instructions.extractor: For each document chunk, identify and extract the most important information. Focus on key facts, insights, decisions, commitments, and significant discussion points. Distinguish between critical information and supporting details. For each extracted element, note its importance level, topic relevance, and any associated speakers or timestamps if applicable.
agent_instructions.aggregator: Combine extracted information from all chunks into a coherent summary. Eliminate redundancies while preserving all important points. Organize information logically based on topics, chronology, or other appropriate structures. Ensure the aggregated content represents a balanced view of the entire document and maintains proper context for extracted information.
agent_instructions.formatter: Format the summary according to the requested style (executive, comprehensive, bullet points, or narrative). Ensure the summary is concise yet comprehensive enough for the selected format. Use appropriate structure, headings, and presentation elements. For executive summaries, focus only on the most critical points. For comprehensive summaries, organize information with clear sections and include supporting details where valuable.

options.executive: Very concise overview of main points
options.bullet_points: Key points in bullet list format
options.narrative: Flowing narrative that preserves the document's story

format.description: Style and format of the generated summary

options.brief: Shortest possible summary capturing only essentials
options.standard: Standard length appropriate for the format
options.detailed: Longer summary with more supporting details

length.description: Controls the length and detail level of the summary

focus_areas.description: Optionally focus on specific aspects of the document (empty means balanced focus)

include_quotes.description: Include direct quotes for important points

overview.description: Brief overview of the entire document

summary.description: Main summary content in the requested format

Important finding or insight from the document

compression_ratio.description: Ratio of summary to original length
